casebody.data:
Joseph P. KOZ, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 02-5081. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: Feb. 12, 2003.

Before NEWMAN, MICHEL, and PROST, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED: AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36
